thread.section_title: Clothoo - Varsity Jackets Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Clothoo - Varsity Jackets | clothoo.com
thread.title: joy campbell
thread.title_full: Clothoo - Varsity Jackets reviewed by joy campbell

author: joy campbell
title: joy campbell
text: I ordered my jackets after confirming I could get them in a short time for an event less than two weeks away they were very good at communicating with me regarding getting them ordered and shipped on time. They kept in contact with me every step of the way thru shipping and they came in plently of time for my event. The jackets are awesome and fit perfect. We did upsize as they recommended and that was good. I cant wait to wear them at our event! I will tell everyone where we got them from! Thank you
